item.title: How do i give npc items?
item.dc:creator: @PkingAddict PkingAddict
item.description:
@PkingAddict wrote:

[quote=“dwarfs222, post:2, topic:453237”]317 or PI,…?
If so go to shops.cfg (souce/data/config)
Than make a new shop with a new ID (NOT USED!). like this

shop = 22 is the ID
1733 is an item ID and 100 is the amount.
Than spawn an NPC.
Than go to actionhandler.java (Source\src\server\model\players)
Add a new code like this:

case 659: c.getShops().openShop(22);
659 is the NPC ID and change the 22 to your shop ID from shops.cfg[/quote]

does this works for 667/704 disturbed/matrix source?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i give npc items?

@dwarfs222 wrote:

317 or PI,…?
If so go to shops.cfg (souce/data/config)
Than make a new shop with a new ID (NOT USED!). like this

shop = 22 is the ID
1733 is an item ID and 100 is the amount.
Than spawn an NPC.
Than go to actionhandler.java (Source\src\server\model\players)
Add a new code like this:

case 659: c.getShops().openShop(22);
659 is the NPC ID and change the 22 to your shop ID from shops.cfg
